descriptions: Student shows no awareness or intention of avoiding people involved in gang activity.
Student expresses minimal awareness of gang activity and its risks, with little to no personal commitment to avoid it.
Student acknowledges the presence of gang activity and expresses some concerns, but lacks a strong personal commitment or plan to avoid it.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of the risks associated with gang activity and expresses a moderate commitment to staying away from those involved.
Student clearly articulates the dangers of gang involvement and expresses a strong personal commitment to avoid such situations and influences.

Student not only expresses a strong personal commitment to avoid gang activity, but also demonstrates proactive strategies and decision-making skills to stay away from harmful influences and encourages peers to do the same.
